articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Kuzma scores 36, Lakers pummel OKC without Davis, LeBron
articles.description: EditorsNote: 14th graf, change 2 of 13 to 2 of 14'
articles.content:
EditorsNote: 14th graf, change 2 of 13 to 2 of 14 
Kyle Kuzma scored a season-high 36 points to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to a 125-110 road win over the Oklahoma City Thunder on Saturday night. 
The win was the Lakers’ eighth consecutive. 
The Lakers led… [+1758 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Convicted Australian cardinal moved to new prison after drone incident: media
articles.description: Jailed Australian Cardinal George Pell, convicted over child sex offences, was moved to another prison last week after a drone flew over the facility where he was being held, local media reported.
articles.content:
MELBOURNE (Reuters) - Jailed Australian Cardinal George Pell, convicted over child sex offences, was moved to another prison last week after a drone flew over the facility where he was being held, local media reported. 
Pell is the most senior Catholic offic… [+1140 chars]

articles.author: Ben Blanchard
articles.title: China says will not change position on Taiwan after landslide election
articles.description: China will not change its position that Taiwan belongs to it, Beijing said on Sunday, after President Tsai Ing-wen won re-election and said she would not submit to China's threats, as state media warned she was courting disaster.
articles.content:
TAIPEI (Reuters) - China will not change its position that Taiwan belongs to it, Beijing said on Sunday, after President Tsai Ing-wen won re-election and said she would not submit to China’s threats, as state media warned she was courting disaster. 
The elec… [+3786 chars]

articles.author: Lizbeth Diaz
articles.title: Relatives of massacre victims torn over future in Mexico as most flee
articles.description: Two months after tragedy struck, beefed-up security has helped calm the holdout residents of a tight-knit community of U.S.-Mexican families of Mormon origin. But with only a few families staying put, at least one village is being hollowed out.

articles.author: Stefanie Eschenbacher and Andre Paultre
articles.title: Decade after Haiti's big quake, president says aid system needs overhaul
articles.description: The international aid system is deeply flawed and needs an overhaul, Haitian President Jovenel Moise said on Saturday, almost 10 years since the impoverished Caribbean island nation was struck by one of the deadliest earthquakes in history.
articles.content: PORT-AU-PRINCE (Reuters) - The international aid system is deeply flawed and needs an overhaul, Haitian President Jovenel Moise said on Saturday, almost 10 years since the impoverished Caribbean island nation was struck by one of the deadliest earthquakes in … [+2869 chars]

articles.author: Panu Wongcha-um
articles.title: Thousands join Thai anti-government run as political climate simmers
articles.description: Thousands of Thais participated on Sunday in a run billed as an anti-government protest, in what appeared to be the biggest show of dissent against the government of former junta leader Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha.
articles.content:
BANGKOK (Reuters) - Thousands of Thais participated on Sunday in a run billed as an anti-government protest, in what appeared to be the biggest show of dissent against the government of former junta leader Prime Minister Prayuth Chan-ocha. 
Thousands of runn… [+2389 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Teenager discovers planet during summer internship
articles.description: NASA recently announced the discovery of a new planet by a teenage summer intern only on the job for three days.  Conway G. Gittens has a look at his discovery.
articles.content:
Posted 
NASA recently announced the discovery of a new planet by a teenage summer intern only on the job for three days. Conway G. Gittens has a look at his discovery.

articles.author: Lidia Kelly
articles.title: Australian PM proposes high-powered inquiry into bushfires response
articles.description: After weeks of criticism over the handling of the bushfires scorching Australia, Prime Minister Scott Morrison said on Sunday he will propose a national review into the response to the disaster, as the fires claimed another firefighter's life.
articles.content: MELBOURNE (Reuters) - After weeks of criticism over the handling of the bushfires scorching Australia, Prime Minister Scott Morrison said on Sunday he will propose a national review into the response to the disaster, as the fires claimed another firefighter’s… [+2312 chars]
